name: The Witch (Rido, MikeCodev)
description:
Game made for the Godot Wild Jam 52

The witch is a horror like game where you have to escape from a mansion by helping lost souls while the spirit of a witch chases you.

Controls are: WASD or ARROWS to move.  SPACE or CTRL to jump. Q to activate/deactivate the flashlight. E to interact.
